snippet: The latest figures suggested that economic activity in China was stabilizing after slower growth in the first part of the year.
abstract: China reports that its economy expanded by 7.8 percent in the third quarter, indicating a firming of economic activity after slower growth in the first part of the year.
lead_paragraph: The latest figures suggested that economic activity in China was stabilizing after slower growth in the first part of the year.

headline.main: China Reports a Modest Acceleration in Growth
headline.print_headline: China Reports a Modest Acceleration in Growth as It Plans for Economic Changes
